boardgame.description: This is the second game in the 'Abenteuer Catan' (Catan Adventures) series that started with Candamir: The First Settlers. The theme of Elasund is based on the 'Die Siedler von Catan' novel written by Rebecca Gabl_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;, itself based on the original The Settlers of Catan game. In Elasund, players compete and cooperate to build the premier city of Catan._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: german manual, but the game parts are completely language independet and i am absolutely sure, that you can find rules translations on boardgamegeek very soon +++++ will be shipped with insurance only +++++ payment for usa, canada, asia or australia : paypal or cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ payment for other non-euro-currency countries in europe : paypal, cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ payment for european countries, that have euro : cash (by letter) or bank transfer (wich by the way is cost-free !) +++++ payment for germany : personal pick up in berlin or bank transfer +++++ for all : no cheques ! +++++ foreign buyers beware : german postal sadly is very expensive for foreign packages (about 18 - 45 euros, it depends on, where the package has to be shipped and the weight), please ask for shipping prices, before you buy !) +++++ shipping inside germany will cost 8 euros, including insurance

Gently played, excellent condition My late husband collected board games, he didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t play all of them, but he sure liked to collect. If game was played, he took excellent care, no food or drink allowed near his games. The time has come to find new homes for his precious games. :) Hoping that they will all go to board game enthusiasts like him. Please feel free to ask any questions. I will try to answer. Thanks!
